0011 0000 0101 0000 ;start
1110 000 0 1010 1111 ;R0 = x3100 
0110 001 000 000000 ;R1 = R0 + 0
0110 010 000 000001 ;R2= R0 + 1
0110 011 000 000010 ;R3 = R0 + 2
0110 100 000 000011 ;R4 = R0+ 3
1110 101 0 1100 1010 ; R5 =x3120
0111 100 101 000000 ;[R5+0] = [x3120+0] = R4
0111 011 101 000001 ;[R5+1] = [x3120+1] = R3
0111 010 101 000010 ;[R5+2] = [x3120+2] = R2
0111 001 101 000011 ;[R5+3] = [x3120+3] = R1
